"Mother," I say, "I have a confession. I used a device to transform Leni into a newborn, but now she will not stop crying."

"Fear not," I say, "The effects are temporary, but for now, what do I do?"

Lisa then spoke “You want to make Lynn swap clothes with Leni then huh?, well I guess this could be fun. Let’s test it out then, all I have to do is press this button and it’s done. Now let’s watch the results shall we?”

Meanwhile In Lynn’s room


Lynn was looking at herself in the mirror after doing an intense workout routine, flexing in the mirror. “Oh man am I looking strong, there is no way that the other team have a chance of beating someone as strong and macho as me” boasted Lynn as she began to laugh knowing that she was the best player on her team. However as she was laughing at how strong and skilled she looked. A strange beam hit her out of nowhere.

Lynn was left dazed and confused from the surprise beam attack. However as Lynn came to senses she was mortified at what she saw. Lynn was mortified to see she was no longer in her Cool red and white jersey and shorts. Rather her clothes had been replaced with some disgustingly girly frilly sea foam green dress, but it was worse as she felt and odd weight in her ears as she realised that she was wearing red hoop earrings and white sandals, topped with light green bows were now where her sneakers once where, all topped off with a pair of rounded white sunglasses with black lenses on top of her head.

Needless to say Lynn wanted to shriek as her strong look that screamed bravado, had been replaced with a style that screamed shopping spree. “Oh my god” Lynn mustered, “I-I look so girly!?!” Spoke Lynn in astonishment, “I look like some air headed fashionista?!?” Continued Lynn in shock as she came to a horrifying realisation. “I LOOK JUST LIKE LENI?!?” shouted Lynn as she covered her mouth hoping nobody heard her.

However to her dismay, she could hear somebody walking towards her door, Lynn wanted to shriek in terror as she saw that the person who opened her door was....
1251141.title: Let’s make Lynn a fashionista

choices: tried to explain what she knew happened
12511411.content:
"YOU HAD SOMETHING TO DO WITH THIS AND I WANT TO KNOW WHY!" leni ordered as she marched towards her sister...
Lynn
12511411.title: Leni now wearing Lynn’s clothes and wanting a...

choices: Leni is giving Lynn a makeover to look just like Leni (complete with hair dye)
125114111.content:
Lynn was surprised and scared, As she had never seen her sister so angry before...or in her clothes before either. Lynn then tried to blurt out everything she knew before her older sister tore her to shreds. “I-i don’t know why I’m in your girly clothes one minute, I was wearing my normal clothes and then this weird beam hit me, next thing I know I’m wearing your stupid clothes!” Finished Lynn as she covered her mouth realising what she has just said to her fashionista sister.

Leni then gasped in shock as she held back her tears of anger. Usually Leni would try to be as nice as possible to someone, but this time Lynn went to far and she had to pay.

Leni then grabbed her younger sisters arm. “Like come with me right now” commanded Leni as she dragged Lynn out of her and Lucy’s room and into Leni’s and Lori’s, with Lynn praying that nobody saw her like this.

Leni then let go once they entered her room and locked the door behind them. Lynn then watched in horror as her sister went into her closet, worried that she was about to do something horrible. However Lynn was relieved when she saw that Leni had exited the closet in her normal outfit. “Oh thank god you just went to get changed, I guess that makes us even then huh?” Prayed Lynn hoping that she was right about what she just said.

“No” replied Leni as she pulled a bag filled with makeup products and hair products as she crushed Lynns dream of everything being ok. “It’s clear you want to look just like me since you tried to steal my clothes and had the nerve to like lie about it”. Continued Leni purposely playing dumb to Lynns story.

“Leni, I’m not lying I don’t want to be anything like you” replied Lynn realising she may have just dug her grave a little deeper. Leni then frowned a little but calmed down almost instantly “oh you don’t have to lie sis, but don’t worry I’m like totally gonna help you” said Leni with a Twisted grin on her face, as Lynn started to get worried again.

“W-what are you gonna do to me?” Asked Lynn as she gasped in terror realising what Leni was going to do to her...
125114111.title: tried to explain what she knew happened

choices: complete make over.. lynn looked like a clone
half make over, only hair and clothes
1251141111.content: How far did leni go...
1251141111.title: Leni is giving Lynn a makeover to look just lik...

choices: Pose for a photo shoot like a model in her Lenified state
12511411111.content:
Lynn was mortified when she realised that Leni was going to give her a makeover to look just like her. Lynn tried to plead. “Please Leni don’t do this to me, I don’t wanna look like you”. However Leni wasn’t listening, and was refusing to buy what Lynn was selling. “Oh stop totally pretending you don’t want this sis” mocked Leni still playing dumb as she forced Lynn to sit down at the vanity table. “ and don’t worry I know you’ll look very pretty when I’m through with you.” Promised Leni as she watched Lynn’s eyes widen from the horror of what was happening.

Leni then began to work on Lynns hair undoing her ponytail and neatly brushing her hair to the horror of lynn praying that something or someone would come and save her from this terror makeover, meanwhile Leni couldn’t help but smile sinisterly as she got back at her sister for her cruel comments about her style. Leni then decided to take her sisters new Leni inspired hair one step further by dying it the same shade of blonde she was. Lynns eyes widened in horror as she watched her hair slowly turn blonde, bye when Leni was done Lynn now unwillingly had long flowing blonde hair that was styled to perfection, that was identical to Leni’s.

“OMG you look so cute with my hairstyle sis!” said Leni gleefully as Lynn blushed from the embarrassing compliment while her jaw was on the floor from the horror she saw in the mirror. “However somethings missing?” Wondered Leni thinking that Lynn wasn’t a perfect little copy of her yet until an idea came to her. “Oh that’s right, silly me how could I be so forgetful, you like totes need some makeup”.

Lynn was then hit with an ever bigger feeling of dread as she saw Leni begin to get out her makeup products, making Lynn wear big fake eyelashes like she did and putting some foundation on her face to make it look nicer and prettier. By when Leni was finished torturing Lynn she was overwhelmed with joy at how successfully the makeover was, picking up Lynn and forcing her to stand next to her in a full body mirror.

“Like OMG sis look at how pretty and stylish you look now, you look just like a little me!” joked Leni enjoying every minute of what was happening. Meanwhile Lynn was mortified to see what had happened to her. She looked identical to Leni now, besides the height difference they could pass as twins, Lynn now felt even more embarrassed thinking about how she no longer looked like a tough tomboy who wanted to be an athletic superstar but now looked more like a little girly fashionista who dreamed of being on a fashion magazine cover.

“Leni please change me back I don’t wanna look like this!” Pleaded Lynn hoping that her usually kind sister would find some way to forgive her, however Leni wasn’t done with her little revenge against Lynn yet knowing just what to do next. “Hmmm I’ll have to think about it” coldly responded Leni which confused Lynn as Leni had never thinked about anything before. “But first you have to totally do something for me?” Continued on Leni with a devilish smile, as Lynn started to get worried again realising that she would probably have to do something really embarrassing again to get out of this situation.

“W-what do you want me to do?” Stuttered out a nervous lynn scared about someone swing the new Lenified her. Leni then though about it and realised she wanted Lynn too......

info.brief_description: The Loud Family & Casagrandes are victims of Lisa’s new batch of experiments
info.description:
Greetings and Salutations,
I am Lisa Loud now before we get started for those of you who don’t know I am the second youngest Loud sibling and the smartest. I have a Mother (Rita), a Father (Lynn), nine older sisters, one younger one and a brother

Lori (17) she has a boyfriend named Bobby(17)
Leni (16) she’s an air head, fashionista
Luna (15) she’s a aspiring rocker & while bisexual currently has a girlfriend Sam
Luan (14) she’s an aspiring comedian/ventriloquist/magician & a prankster
Lynn jr (13) she’s a tomboy & very competitive
Lincoln (11) a typical boy shares some interest with us
Lucy (8) she’s completely goth & somehow even I don’t understand can teleport
Lana (6) she’s a tomboy & the family handyman. She may have PICA*
Lola (6) she’s a girly girl & a beauty queen
Lily (15 months) the baby of the family & seems to be as intelligent as me

& then there’s our pets Charles (pitbull terrier), Cliff (short-haired cat), Geo (hamster), Walt (canary), Fangs (Lucy's pet bat) & Hops (Lana's pet frog)

So now that you know my family & our pets, if want to participate in my latest experiments which might involve our friends, then please continue...

——————————————————————-
*PICA = a disorder that lets a person eat anything (this is a personal guess as to why Lana eats garbage as it’s not (yet) been brought up on the show)
